alert.note: Alert for Northern Coos; Northern Grafton; Southern Coos (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 15 at 12:25PM EST until January 18 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EST TONIGHT... ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... ...WIND CHILL WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills 20 to 30 below zero. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow possible. * WHERE...Portions of northern New Hampshire and west central and western Maine. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, until midnight EST tonight. For the Winter Storm Watch, from late Sunday night through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult on Monday. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Northern Coos; Northern Grafton; Southern Coos
